defaultProblems.title: Two Sum
defaultProblems.description: Given an array of integers and a key, return True if there are two values within the array that add up to the key. Return False otherwise.

defaultProblems.title: Knapsack
defaultProblems.description: Given the weights and values of n items and a capacity W of a sack. Find the maximum value of items to put in the sack without going over capacity.

defaultProblems.title: Sudoku Solver
defaultProblems.description: Given an unfinished sudoku puzzle, output a correctly solved sudoku puzzle.

defaultProblems.title: Count Bits
defaultProblems.description: Write a function that takes an unsigned integer and return the number of '1' bits it has (also known as the Hamming weight).

defaultProblems.title: Decimal to Roman
defaultProblems.description: Given an integer, convert it to a roman numeral. Input is guaranteed to be within the range from 1 to 3999.

defaultProblems.title: Remove Kth last element from LL
defaultProblems.description: Given a linked list, remove the k-th node from the end of list and return its head.

defaultProblems.title: Decimal to Roman
defaultProblems.description: Given an integer, convert it to a roman numeral. Input is guaranteed to be within the range from 1 to 3999.

defaultProblems.title: DP Fibonacci
defaultProblems.description: The Fibonacci numbers, commonly denoted F(n) form a sequence, called the Fibonacci sequence, such that each number is the sum of the two preceding ones, starting from 0 and 1.

defaultProblems.title: Delete duplicates
defaultProblems.description: Given a sorted array, delete all duplicates in the array.

defaultProblems.title: Swap Bits
defaultProblems.description: Write a function that swaps the ith and jth bit of a given long.

defaultProblems.title: Rod Cutting
defaultProblems.description: Given a rod of n inches and an array of prices of pieces of size smaller than n. Determine the maximum value obtainable by cutting the rod and selling it.

defaultProblems.title: Merge 2 sorted LL
defaultProblems.description: Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new sorted list. The new list should be made by splicing together the nodes of the first two lists.

defaultProblems.title: Merge 2 sorted LL
defaultProblems.description: Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a new sorted list. The new list should be made by splicing together the nodes of the first two lists.

defaultProblems.title: Even Odd Sum
defaultProblems.description: Check if a sum of sequence of consecutive n integers is even or odd or neither. The sequence can start from any number on the real integer line. Return 1 for even, return 0 for odd, return -1 for neither.

defaultProblems.title: Compute power pow(x,y) => x^y
defaultProblems.description: Given a double x and int y, return x^y as a double.

defaultProblems.title: Optimal Sort Moves
defaultProblems.description: Determine the number of "moves" it would take to sort an int array. Each move is considered the move of ONE int. For example, A[4] to the 3rd index. And NOT, "Swap A[4] and A[5]".

defaultContacts.name: Big Panda
defaultContacts.bio: Hi, my name is Panda. I am a Panda officer at University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science, and I frequently work with Bamboo.

defaultContacts.name: Teacher Panda
defaultContacts.bio: Hi, my name is Panda. I am a Panda teacher at University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science, and I frequently work with Bamboo.
